refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A filter for transforming GIFS. With no options, it's an expensive copy of a GIF in standard input to standard output. Options specify filtering operations and are performed in the order specified on the command line.
The -b option sets the screen background color.
The -d option sets a delay time, in hundredths of a second.
The -I option sets the interlace bit in all images. The -i option clears it in all images.
The -t option sets the index of the transparency color in all images.
